list.title: NVController
list.description: NVController is for synchronizing both remote and local instances of Niivue

list.title: NVController#connectToSession
list.description: Connects to existing session or creates new session

list.title: NVController#onAzimuthElevationChangeHandler
list.description: Azimuth and/or elevation has changed

list.title: NVController#onClipPlaneChangeHandler
list.description: Clip plane has changed

list.title: NVController#onCustomMeshShaderAddedHandler
list.description: Custom mesh shader has been added

list.title: NVController#onFrameChangeHandler
list.description: Frame for 4D image has changed

list.title: NVController#onImageLoadedHandler
list.description: A volume has been added

list.title: NVController#onMeshAddedFromUrlHandler
list.description: Notifies that a mesh has been loaded by URL

list.title: NVController#onMeshLoadedHandler
list.description: Notifies that a mesh has been added

list.title: NVController#onMeshPropertyChanged
list.description: Mesh property has been changed

list.title: NVController#onMeshShaderChanged
list.description: Mesh shader has changed

list.title: NVController#onVolumeAddedFromUrlHandler
list.description: Add an image and notify subscribers

list.title: NVController#onVolumeWithUrlRemovedHandler
list.description: Notifies other users that a volume has been removed

list.title: NVController#onZoom3DChangeHandler
list.description: Zoom level has changed

list.title: NVDocument
list.description: Factory method to return an instance of NVDocument from a URL

list.title: NVDocument
list.description: Factory method to return an instance of NVDocument from a File object

list.title: NVDocument#addImageOptions
list.description: Adds an image and the options an image was created with

list.title: NVDocument#download
list.description: Downloads a JSON file with options, scene, images, meshes and drawing of {@link Niivue} instance

list.title: NVDocument#encodedDrawingBlob
list.description: Gets the base 64 encoded blob of the associated drawing

list.title: NVDocument#encodedImageBlobs
list.description: Gets the base 64 encoded blobs of associated images

list.title: NVDocument#getImageOptions
list.description: Returns the options for the image if it was added by url

list.title: NVDocument#hasImage
list.description: Checks if document has an image by id

list.title: NVDocument#hasImageFromUrl
list.description: Checks if document has an image by url

list.title: NVDocument#json
list.description: Converts NVDocument to JSON

list.title: NVDocument#opts
list.description: Gets the options of the {@link Niivue} instance

list.title: NVDocument#opts
list.description: Sets the options of the {@link Niivue} instance

list.title: NVDocument#previewImageDataURL
list.description: Gets preview image blob

list.title: NVDocument#previewImageDataURL
list.description: Sets preview image blob

list.title: NVDocument#removeImage
list.description: Removes image from the document as well as its options

list.title: NVDocument#scene.clipPlane
list.description: Gets the current clip plane

list.title: NVDocument#scene.clipPlane
list.description: Gets the current clip plane

list.title: NVDocument#scene.clipPlaneDepthAziElev
list.description: Gets current Plane Depth

list.title: NVDocument#scene.clipPlaneDepthAziElev
list.description: Sets current depth, azimuth and elevation of clip plane

list.title: NVDocument#scene.crosshairPos
list.description: Gets current crosshairs position

list.title: NVDocument#scene.crosshairPos
list.description: sets current crosshairs position

list.title: NVDocument#scene.renderAzimuth
list.description: Gets azimuth of scene

list.title: NVDocument#scene.renderElevation
list.description: Gets elevation of scene

list.title: NVDocument#scene.volScaleMultiplier
list.description: Gets the scale/zoom of the scene

list.title: NVDocument#scene.volScaleMultiplier
list.description: Sets scale/zoom of the scene

list.title: NVDocument#title
list.description: Title of the document

list.title: NVDocument.deserializeMeshDataObjects
list.description: Deserialize mesh data objects

list.title: NVDocument.loadFromJSON
list.description: Factory method to return an instance of NVDocument from JSON

list.title: NVIMAGE_TYPE
list.description: Enum for supported image types

list.title: NVImage
list.description: a NVImage encapsulates some images data and provides methods to query and operate on images

list.title: NVImage
list.description: factory function to load and return a new NVImage instance from a given URL

list.title: NVImage
list.description: factory function to load and return a new NVImage instance from a file in the browser

list.title: NVImage
list.description: factory function to load and return a new NVImage instance from a base64 encoded string

list.title: NVImage#applyOptionsUpdate
list.description: Update options for image

list.title: NVImage#clone
list.description: make a clone of a NVImage instance and return a new NVImage

list.title: NVImage#colorMaps
list.description: query all available color maps that can be applied to volumes

list.title: NVImage#getImageMetadata
list.description: get nifti specific metadata about the image

list.title: NVImage#toUint8Array
list.description: Converts NVImage to NIfTI compliant byte array

list.title: NVImage#zeroImage
list.description: fill a NVImage instance with zeros for the image data

list.title: NVImage.zerosLike
list.description: a factory function to make a zero filled image given a NVImage as a reference

list.title: NVImageFromUrlOptions
list.description: NVImageFromUrlOptions

list.title: NVImageMetadata
list.description: Image M.

list.title: NVMESSAGE
list.description: Enum for sync operations

list.title: NVMesh
list.description: a NVImage encapsulates some images data and provides methods to query and operate on images

list.title: NVMesh.loadFromBase64
list.description: load and return a new NVMesh instance from a base64 encoded string

list.title: NVMesh.loadFromFile
list.description: factory function to load and return a new NVMesh instance from a file in the browser

list.title: NVMesh.loadFromUrl
list.description: factory function to load and return a new NVMesh instance from a given URL

list.title: NVMessage
list.description: NVMessage can be used to synchronize a session actions

list.title: Niivue
list.description:
Niivue can be attached to a canvas. An instance of Niivue contains methods for
loading and rendering NIFTI image data in a WebGL 2.0 context.

list.title: Niivue#addMesh
list.description: add a new mesh to the canvas

list.title: Niivue#addMeshFromUrl
list.description: Add mesh and notify subscribers

list.title: Niivue#addVolume
list.description: add a new volume to the canvas

list.title: Niivue#addVolumeFromUrl
list.description: Add an image and notify subscribers

list.title: Niivue#attachTo
list.description: attach the Niivue instance to the webgl2 canvas by element id

list.title: Niivue#attachToCanvas
list.description: attach the Niivue instance to a canvas element directly

list.title: Niivue#cloneVolume
list.description: clone a volume and return a new volume

list.title: Niivue#colorMaps
list.description: query all available color maps that can be applied to volumes

list.title: Niivue#colormap
list.description: determine active 3D volume from 4D time series

list.title: Niivue#createEmptyDrawing
list.description: generate a blank canvas for the pen tool

list.title: Niivue#drawGrowCut
list.description:
dilate drawing so all voxels are colored.
works on drawing with multiple colors

list.title: Niivue#drawMosaic
list.description: display a lightbox or montage view

list.title: Niivue#drawOtsu
list.description: remove dark voxels in air

list.title: Niivue#drawUndo
list.description: Restore drawing to previous state

list.title: Niivue#getDescriptives
list.description: basic statistics for selected voxel-based image

list.title: Niivue#getFrame4D
list.description: determine active 3D volume from 4D time series

list.title: Niivue#getMediaByUrl
list.description: Find media by url

list.title: Niivue#getOverlayIndexByID
list.description: get the index of an overlay by its unique id. unique ids are assigned to the NVImage.id property when a new NVImage is created.

list.title: Niivue#getRadiologicalConvention
list.description: Detect if display is using radiological or neurological convention.

list.title: Niivue#getVolumeIndexByID
list.description: get the index of a volume by its unique id. unique ids are assigned to the NVImage.id property when a new NVImage is created.

list.title: Niivue#isMeshExt
list.description: Returns boolean: true if filename ends with mesh extension (TRK, pial, etc)

list.title: Niivue#loadConnectome
list.description: load a connectome specified by json

list.title: Niivue#loadDocument
list.description: Loads an NVDocument

list.title: Niivue#loadDrawingFromUrl
list.description: Open drawing

list.title: Niivue#loadMeshes
list.description: load an array of meshes

list.title: Niivue#loadVolumes
list.description: load an array of volume objects

list.title: Niivue#meshShaderNames
list.description: retrieve all currently loaded meshes

list.title: Niivue#moveCrosshairInVox
list.description: move crosshair a fixed number of voxels (not mm)

list.title: Niivue#moveVolumeDown
list.description: Move a volume down one index position in the stack of loaded volumes. This moves it down one layer

list.title: Niivue#moveVolumeToBottom
list.description: Move a volume to the bottom of the stack of loaded volumes. The volume will become the background

list.title: Niivue#moveVolumeToTop
list.description: Move a volume to the top position in the stack of loaded volumes. This will be the top layer

list.title: Niivue#moveVolumeUp
list.description: Move a volume up one index position in the stack of loaded volumes. This moves it up one layer

list.title: Niivue#off
list.description: off unsubscribes events and subjects (the opposite of on)

list.title: Niivue#on
list.description: register a callback function to run when known Niivue events happen

list.title: Niivue#removeHaze
list.description: remove dark voxels in air

list.title: Niivue#removeMesh
list.description: Remove a triangulated mesh, connectome or tractogram

list.title: Niivue#removeMeshByUrl
list.description: Remove a triangulated mesh, connectome or tractogram

list.title: Niivue#removeVolume
list.description: Remove a volume

list.title: Niivue#removeVolumeByIndex
list.description: Remove a volume by index

list.title: Niivue#removeVolumeByUrl
list.description: Remove volume by url

list.title: Niivue#reverseFaces
list.description: reverse triangle winding of mesh (swap front and back faces)

list.title: Niivue#saveImage
list.description: save voxel-based image to disk

list.title: Niivue#saveScene
list.description: save webgl2 canvas as png format bitmap

list.title: Niivue#setClipPlane
list.description: update the clip plane orientation in 3D view mode

list.title: Niivue#setClipPlaneColor
list.description: set the color of the 3D clip plane

list.title: Niivue#setColorMap
list.description: update the colormap of an image given its ID

list.title: Niivue#setColorMapNegative
list.description: use given color map for negative voxels in image

list.title: Niivue#setCornerOrientationText
list.description: determine if text appears at corner (true) or sides of 2D slice.

list.title: Niivue#setCrosshairColor
list.description: set the crosshair color

list.title: Niivue#setCrosshairWidth
list.description: set thickness of crosshair

list.title: Niivue#setDrawOpacity
list.description: control whether drawing is transparent (0), opaque (1) or translucent (between 0 and 1).

list.title: Niivue#setDrawingEnabled
list.description: does dragging over a 2D slice create a drawing?

list.title: Niivue#setFrame4D
list.description: show desired 3D volume from 4D time series

list.title: Niivue#setHighResolutionCapable
list.description: Force WebGL canvas to use high resolution display, regardless of browser defaults.

list.title: Niivue#setInterpolation
list.description: select between nearest and linear interpolation for voxel based images

list.title: Niivue#setMeshLayerProperty
list.description: reverse triangle winding of mesh (swap front and back faces)

list.title: Niivue#setMeshProperty
list.description: change property of mesh, tractogram or connectome

list.title: Niivue#setMeshShader
list.description: select new shader for triangulated meshes and connectomes. Note that this function requires the mesh is fully loaded: you may want use `await` with loadMeshes (as seen in live demo).

list.title: Niivue#setMeshThicknessOn2D
list.description: Limit visibility of mesh in front of a 2D image. Requires world-space mode.

list.title: Niivue#setModulationImage
list.description: modulate intensity of one image based on intensity of another

list.title: Niivue#setOpacity
list.description: set the opacity of a volume given by volume index

list.title: Niivue#setPan2Dxyzmm
list.description: adjust offset position and scale of 2D sliceScale

list.title: Niivue#setPenValue
list.description: determine color and style of drawing

list.title: Niivue#setRadiologicalConvention
list.description: control whether 2D slices use radiological or neurological convention.

list.title: Niivue#setRenderAzimuthElevation
list.description: set rotation of 3D render view

list.title: Niivue#setScale
list.description: set the scale of the 3D rendering. Larger numbers effectively zoom.

list.title: Niivue#setSelectionBoxColor
list.description: set the selection box color. A selection box is drawn when you right click and drag to change image intensity

list.title: Niivue#setSliceMM
list.description: control 2D slice view mode.

list.title: Niivue#setSliceMosaicString
list.description: Create a custom multi-slice mosaic (aka lightbox, montage) view.

list.title: Niivue#setSliceType
list.description: set the slice type. This changes the view mode

list.title: Niivue#setVolume
list.description: set the index of a volume. This will change it's ordering and appearance if there are multiple volumes loaded.

list.title: Niivue#sph2cartDeg
list.description: convert spherical AZIMUTH, ELEVATION to Cartesian

list.title: Niivue#syncWith
list.description: Sync the scene controls (orientation, crosshair location, etc.) from one Niivue instance to another. useful for using one canvas to drive another.

list.title: Niivue#updateGLVolume
list.description: update the webGL 2.0 scene after making changes to the array of volumes. It's always good to call this method after altering one or more volumes manually (outside of Niivue setter methods)

list.title: NiivueObject3D
list.description: Object rendered with WebGL

list.title: NiivueOptions
list.description: Niivue exposes many properties. It's always good to call `updateGLVolume` after altering one of these settings.

list.title: SLICE_TYPE
list.description: Slice Type

list.title: SessionBus
list.description: SessionBus is for synchronizing both remote and local instances

list.title: SessionUser
list.description: SessionUser specifies display name, user id and user key

list.title: storageAvailable
list.description: Checks if local storage is available
